channel.title: Award nomination thread
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt]Award nominations[/size][/center]
Post your nominations for people who you think deserve a moparcraft award(s). We currently only have two awards: Moparcraft builder, and Moparcraft PVPer. The award names pretty much explain what they're for but I'll provide a description for them either way.
[b]Moparcraft Builder - [/b] For members who have shown immense skill in the building of structures on Moparcraft, this is for the artistic members of the community.
[b]Moparcraft PVPer - [/b] For those who just love to tactically kill others and do PVP like things on the server. This award is for those with a pure indisputable reputation of PVP.
[b]Redstone engineer - [/b] For those who have demonstrated excellent understanding with redstone, and have contributed their knowledge to the community.
[hr]
Hopefully over time we can get some new awards added, but for now that's it. Before you nominate anyone please pay close attention to the following guidelines/nomination rules:
[b]1)[/b] Do NOT nominate someone based purely on friendship.
[b]2)[/b] Do NOT reveal who you've nominated to the person (includes staff nominations) or anyone else, what is posted in this section stays in this section so revealing stuff would be leaking.
[b]3)[/b] Please state the persons IGN/Forum name and why you think they deserve the award, as well with potential images/links which can support what you're saying.

item.title: Award nomination thread
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I’d like to nominate deathwilldie for the builder award. I have seen quite a number of impressive builds from him including an underground lava room (I can’t seem to find the entrance anymore), his artistic designs both on his own house and the houses around his village and whatever this may be:

0eGB0.png854×480

Although the recent posts about his possible xraying may conflict with the possibility of him receiving it, I still believe he has quite an aptitude for building

Read full topic

item.title: Award nomination thread
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I went there with you, so of course, I also agree

He now has the award.

Read full topic

item.title: Award nomination thread
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

I think the 3 awards will be fine. We can always add more awards later as game features get added or updated.

Edit: I’m nominating Phaze one(fuscate) for Builder award for his unfinished arena at x: -449 z: 434

Read full topic

item.title: Award nomination thread
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I suppose you’re right actually, scratch that unless anyone has an argument for it? I guess the 3 awards cover pretty much everything we need right now. We don’t really want to end up in a situation that Moparisthebest.com is in with an absolute ton of awards…

Read full topic

item.title: Award nomination thread
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I agree with Tom_BETA that the awards should only be given out for things done on moparcraft.

I don’t know about a batman-cup type reward, I don’t see it being given to anyone.

Read full topic

item.title: Award nomination thread
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Updated the announcement thread with the new award.

I’d also like to get some opinions on a question:

Moparcraft awards

Does the building have to be on moparcraft only? What if Ishowed a single player build?

My personal view is yes, it would prosper the server activity and generate a more attractive server, it’s like giving someone tutorial author for their contributions to other communities.

What do you guys think?

I would also like to discuss the idea of an all round contribution award, considering Moparisthebest shunned my latest attempt at getting it discussed I have a feeling I’m going to have quite a few members in the opposition.

The award would work somewhat like Batman (I think…How does Batman work again?). It’s an award for the members who have contributed to the community consistently for a long period of time, so it’s an award that will barely be handed out but I think it’s only right those who help Moparcraft get something in return.

We’ve covered the main elements in Moparcraft with the awards up to now, unless anyone has a better idea I think this should be the final award we add.

Tarkoff:

Like the award, My vote is for Agentmoose. He got some cool stuff.

I’ve gone ahead and put my own description on the thread: http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,532890.0.html

My view is that they should contribute their knowledge of redstone to the community, if they don’t, then how are they really demonstrating their talent? I can make cool stuff in web development languages, that doesn’t make me eligible for the web development award because I simply haven’t contributed anything which would demonstrate that.

Read full topic

item.title: Award nomination thread
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

Like the award, My vote is for Agentmoose. He got some cool stuff.

Read full topic

Post your nominations for people who you think deserve a moparcraft award(s). We currently only have two awards: Moparcraft builder, and Moparcraft PVPer. The award names pretty much explain what they’re for but I’ll provide a description for them either way.
